title: Fencing the Sky
description: From critically acclaimed author of The Meadow comes a haunting novel of the American West.Circumstances spiral out of control when an accidental murder springs from the best intentions. With one man dead and another on the run, this is a story about violence and how it destroys lives when the land is at stake. This lyrical first novel--long-awaited by the many admirers of James Galvin's The Meadow--is nothing less than the story of the disappearance of the American West.
author: James Galvin
